title: Tomba Phone Finder Actor Input
description: Input schema for the Tomba Phone Finder Actor that discovers phone numbers using the Tomba API.

tombaApiKey.title: Tomba API Key
tombaApiKey.description: Your Tomba API key (ta_xxxx). Get it from https://app.tomba.io/api

tombaApiSecret.title: Tomba Secret Key
tombaApiSecret.description: Your Tomba secret key (ts_xxxx). Get it from https://app.tomba.io/api

searches.title: Search Queries
searches.description: Array of search queries to find phone numbers. Each query can contain email, domain, or LinkedIn profile.

email.title: Email Address
email.description: Email address to find phone number for

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Domain to search for phone numbers

linkedin.title: LinkedIn Profile
linkedin.description: LinkedIn profile URL to find phone number for

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of phone numbers to find. Default is 50.
